record.text: The sky opens.

Thank you, Nancy.

My humblest APOLOGIES, Your Royal Highness. 

I assure you I will administer a STERN disciplining of Mr. Astra! Be assured it was a careless slip, and the young Acolyte did NOT intend to address you as 'dad'.

I, on behalf of the Academy, humbly request your clemency.

record.text:
Last night I was out near the old Crotchwood estate harvesting bogworms for my fishing trip and I saw a strange glow coming from a window… 🪟

The place has been empty for some time so it was very odd… I snuck up to take a look and witnessed something truly disturbing! 😨

1/2

A man in a green cloak was facing a big mirror and gesturing wildly, seemingly very upset 😳

Then six ARMS came RIGHT OUT of the mirror and grabbed three objects from the man’s grasp — the arms did not look HUMAN 😰

The man then spun toward me and looked right at me with crazed eyes 🧿🧿

I ran!

2/2

A weighty selection this is. It could very well set the tone for my entire reign!!! I will ruminate on it further, and then I will inform the high-strung fellow who has been following me around of my decision.

post.text: A weighty selection this is. It could very well set the tone for my entire reign!!! I will ruminate on it further, and then I will inform the high-strung fellow who has been following me around of my decision.

record.text: Good eve Diary! I granted my first-ever royal audiences yesterday (!!!) to two enterprising, sweaty little villagers, and I must now select a path forward for bridge repairs!

It is an absolute pity that the third individual selected to share their pitch did not make an appearance. A scroll with the word “bridge” written on it – an inspired concept! I was positively desperate to hear more!

record.text: Good eve Diary! I granted my first-ever royal audiences yesterday (!!!) to two enterprising, sweaty little villagers, and I must now select a path forward for bridge repairs!

The second pitch was given by the unclean little boy I saw the day I arrived in town! What fun! He spoke of ridges, or perhaps badges? And mock fiends and a Master Puffy and Meowmers? These must be his feline companions? But he had an indefinable quality, ‘neath all that mire, an entrepreneur I see.

record.text: Good eve Diary! I granted my first-ever royal audiences yesterday (!!!) to two enterprising, sweaty little villagers, and I must now select a path forward for bridge repairs!

The first pitch came from a handsome, paunchy young chap. He carried himself like a man with something to prove. He spoke eloquently, but I found my mind wandering – this tree is enormous! – and I must say I remember very little of what he said. But I would trust him with a bridge.

record.text: Good eve Diary! I granted my first-ever royal audiences yesterday (!!!) to two enterprising, sweaty little villagers, and I must now select a path forward for bridge repairs!

(Frankly I do not see why the townsfolk could not just use their Yontish rosewood gondolas indefinitely, a much more efficient form of aquatic transit if you ask me, but I must say I was thoroughly delighted by the proposals!)
